title.narrative: Central African Republic Human Capital and Women and Girls' Empowerment (Ma ngo) Project

description.narrative: To enhance access to essential health services, education and employment opportunities that empower women and adolescent girls in targeted areas of the Central African Republic.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Economy, Planning and Cooperation (Ministere de lâ€™Economie, du Plan et de la Cooperation

description.narrative: Total Commitment in Second Quarter of 2021

condition.narrative: Acquiring an accounting software and training the fiduciary staff on the use of that software no later than three (3) months afterproject effectiveness.
Health care waste management plan must be prepared before community health workers are deployed through the project to providehealth services in target communities.

No later than one (1) month after the effective date prepare a draft work plan and budget for project implementation, settingforth, inter alia: (i) a detailed description of the planned activities including any proposed conferences and training, under theproject for the period covered by the plan; (ii) the sources and proposed use of funds therefor; (iii) procurement andenvironmental and social safeguards arrangements therefor, as applicable and; (iv) responsibility for the execution of said projectactivities, budgets, start and completion dates, outputs and monitoring indicators to track progress of each activity
Selection of an external auditor on ToRs (project accounts) no later than six (6) months after project effectiveness
The Project Operational Manual must be completed within 30 days of Project Effectiveness.

The key personnel of the Project Implementation Unit must be in place within 30 days of Project Effectiveness. Key personnelinclude: a project coordinator, a procurement specialist, a financial management specialist, an internal auditor, an accountant, amonitoring and evaluation specialist, a senior environmental specialist, a senior social development specialist, a gender-basedviolence specialist and a security specialist.
